item.title: Nintendo’s stock has been a big winner, but have Switch 2 expectations gotten too high?
item.description: Wedbush adopts a more cautious stance on Nintendo’s stock, saying Switch 2 forecasts may be out of whack and competition is heated.

item.title: A Ben & Jerry’s co-founder is quitting. He says Unilever and Magnum have muzzled the ice-cream company’s voice.
item.description: Jerry Greenfield said he’s quitting the ice-cream company he co-founded with Ben Cohen.
